channel.title: Weapon-Archetype on Fen TTRPG
channel.description: Recent content in Weapon-Archetype on Fen TTRPG

item.title: Ammunition
item.description:
A weapon’s ammunition. This archetype is used to give a special type of ammunition to long-arms and short-arms. Includes arrows and bullets.

Ammunition
item.content:
A weapon’s ammunition. This archetype is used to give a special type of ammunition to long-arms and short-arms. Includes arrows and bullets.

Ammunition

item.title: Ax
item.description:
A weapon with a short handle and a flat ax head in one or more directions. The ax archetype encompasses throwing axes/hatches, battle axes, woodcutting axes, etc. This archetype does not include polearms with ax heads or cleaver knives.

Ax Weapons

  • Battleax
  • Greatax
  • Handax
  • War pick
item.content:
A weapon with a short handle and a flat ax head in one or more directions. The ax archetype encompasses throwing axes/hatches, battle axes, woodcutting axes, etc. This archetype does not include polearms with ax heads or cleaver knives.

Ax Weapons

  • Battleax
  • Greatax
  • Handax
  • War pick

item.title: Cudgel
item.description:
A blunt or heavy weapon used to bludgeon or slam enemies. The cudgel archetype encompasses maces, clubs, heavy clubs, warhammers, great-hammers, sheleighly, etc.

Cudgel Weapons

  • Club
  • Flail
  • Greatclub
  • Hammer
  • Mace
  • Maul
  • Morningstar
  • Staff
item.content:
A blunt or heavy weapon used to bludgeon or slam enemies. The cudgel archetype encompasses maces, clubs, heavy clubs, warhammers, great-hammers, sheleighly, etc.

Cudgel Weapons

  • Club
  • Flail
  • Greatclub
  • Hammer
  • Mace
  • Maul
  • Morningstar
  • Staff

item.title: Long-arm
item.description: A weapon used with precision in short to long range engagements. The focus of these weapons is in precision and one needs to be trained for accuracy. We lump bows and rifles into one archetype because their archetypes are similar (i.e., precision based weapons with high skill ceilings). Note: not all ages have rifles. Note: This archetype include both short and long bows, rifles of all kinds, and other precision-focused ranged weapons.
item.content:
A weapon used with precision in short to long range engagements. The focus of these weapons is in precision and one needs to be trained for accuracy. We lump bows and rifles into one archetype because their archetypes are similar (i.e., precision based weapons with high skill ceilings). Note: not all ages have rifles. Note: This archetype include both short and long bows, rifles of all kinds, and other precision-focused ranged weapons.

Long-arm Weapon

  • Heavy Crossbow
  • Light Crossbow
  • Longbow
  • Shortbow

item.title: Long-blade
item.description:
A long bladed weapon used in both piercing and slashing. The long blade archetype encompasses all swords and great-swords.

Long Blade Weapons

  • Bastard Sword
  • Greatsword
  • Longsword
item.content:
A long bladed weapon used in both piercing and slashing. The long blade archetype encompasses all swords and great-swords.

Long Blade Weapons

  • Bastard Sword
  • Greatsword
  • Longsword

item.title: Polearm
item.description:
A weapon that is a long stick ended in a blade/weapon head. The polearm archetype encompasses all polearms including spears.

Polearm Weapons

  • Bident
  • Glaive
  • Halberd
  • Lance
  • Pike
  • Spear
  • Trident
item.content:
A weapon that is a long stick ended in a blade/weapon head. The polearm archetype encompasses all polearms including spears.

Polearm Weapons

  • Bident
  • Glaive
  • Halberd
  • Lance
  • Pike
  • Spear
  • Trident

item.title: Shield
item.description:
A shield or shield-like weapon. The primary focus is on defense. The shield archetype encompasses all shields and held defenses.

Shield Weapons

  • Buckler
  • Heavy Shield
  • Pavise
  • Shield
  • Tower Shield
item.content:
A shield or shield-like weapon. The primary focus is on defense. The shield archetype encompasses all shields and held defenses.

Shield Weapons

  • Buckler
  • Heavy Shield
  • Pavise
  • Shield
  • Tower Shield

item.title: Short-arm
item.description:
A weapon used at range within proximity of melee combat. We lump thrown weapons and pistols into one archetype because their archetypes are similar (i.e., ranged weapon in close quarters). Note: not all ages have pistols. This archetype includes all thrown weapons and all pistols.

Short-arm Weapons

  • Blowgun
  • Dart
  • Hand Crossbow
  • Javelin
  • Sling
item.content:
A weapon used at range within proximity of melee combat. We lump thrown weapons and pistols into one archetype because their archetypes are similar (i.e., ranged weapon in close quarters). Note: not all ages have pistols. This archetype includes all thrown weapons and all pistols.

Short-arm Weapons

  • Blowgun
  • Dart
  • Hand Crossbow
  • Javelin
  • Sling

item.title: Short-Blade
item.description:
A short bladed weapon used for both piercing and slashing. The short blade archetype encompasses all knives and daggers.

Short-blade Weapons

  • Curved Blade
  • Dagger
  • Knife
  • Rapier
  • Shortsword
item.content:
A short bladed weapon used for both piercing and slashing. The short blade archetype encompasses all knives and daggers.

Short-blade Weapons

  • Curved Blade
  • Dagger
  • Knife
  • Rapier
  • Shortsword

item.title: Whip
item.description:
A whip or whip-like weapon. The whip archetype is narrow and more focused on mobility or control than damage.

Whip Weapons

  • Whip
item.content:
A whip or whip-like weapon. The whip archetype is narrow and more focused on mobility or control than damage.

Whip Weapons

  • Whip
